attributes.action: reconsider the ban on music videos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is just not right that we should be stoped from lisening to our old music why should we be made to suffer when you can get it in the us but not in the uk

rejection.details: Although not clear from the petition text, presumably this refers to Youtube.  This is a commercial licensing decision and not something on which this office can comment.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
